segments.text: Honey , I ’ ll be right back !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I told you already ! I ’ m going to get my nails done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Again ? You just went last week ! You spend more time at the nail salon than you do here at home ! Honestly , why do you need a manicure every week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , first of all , I like to pamper myself , and my nails look great . You should come with me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? I don ’ t want to have nail polish or anything like that !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They don ’ t only paint my nails ! The manicurist will remove my cuticles , file my nails , and apply at least nails coats of nail polish !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , sounds like something I should definitely do .
segments.speaker: S2
